resources.string: The given phone number is already associated to a customer account.
The given phone number does not correspond to an existing customer account.
Enrollment failed because of a bad capture.

Hello %s,
are you sure you want to un-enroll?
This action will remove your account
and data from our system.
Please confirm if you'd like to proceed.
Are you sure you want to exit?
By clicking return to home screen,\nyou\'ll finalize the entire process,\nand it will reset to the beginning.
The capture failed because it was canceled.
Please place your hand\nabove the sensor
flat and parallel to the sensor
Processing data…\nYou can remove your hand

Please enter the OTP\nyour just received on your phone.
Failed to validate OTP. Please check again, or resend code.
Choose the payment method\nyou want to tokenize
It looks like we already know you !\nYou are not enrolled
No user matches this face or palm image\nYou are not un-enrolled
